bootDeviceExternal: Set J11 (just next to the micro SD card slot) to position 2-3 (the position furthest away from the edge of the board).
flashIndicator: the device is offline in the dashboard and disconnect the power cable.
bootDeviceInternal: Set J11 (just next to the micro SD card slot) to position 1-2 (the position closest to the edge of the board).
bootDevice: Remove and re-connect power to the {{name}}.
